nodes.documentation:
@dev Cancel a loan proposal. The sender must be in the PROPOSED state, i.e. have a
  proposed loan but not yet granted
nodes.name: cancelProposal

nodes.documentation:
@dev Grant a loan to a proposer. Can only be called by stake contract
@param _candidate The proposer's address

nodes.documentation:
@dev Return a loan to the Clint system. If the paid amount exceeds what is stated, the
  excess will be kept by the contract
nodes.name: returnLoan

devdoc.author: Senapati Sang Diwangkara, from Affluent team

cancelLoanOf(address).details: Manually cancels the loan process of a proposer. Can only be called by root

cancelProposal().details: Cancel a loan proposal. The sender must be in the PROPOSED state, i.e. have a  proposed loan but not yet granted

liquidateLoan(address).details: Grant a loan to a proposer. Can only be called by stake contract

proposeLoan(uint256,uint256).details: Proposes a loan to the Clint system. Each address can only have 1 active lending  process at a time

params._term: The promised duration to return the money (in seconds)
params._value: The amount of money to be lent

returnLoan().details: Return a loan to the Clint system. If the paid amount exceeds what is stated, the  excess will be kept by the contract

setInterestRateDenom(uint256).details: Set the interest rate's denominator. Can only be called by root

setInterestRateNum(uint256).details: Set the interest rate's numerator. Can only be called by root

setLatenessMultiplierDenom(uint256).details: Set the lateness rate's denominator. Can only be called by root

setLatenessMultiplierNum(uint256).details: Set the lateness rate's numerator. Can only be called by root

setStakeContractAddr(address).details: Set the stake contract's address. Can only be called once

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw ETH from the contract into root's account. Can only be called by root

devdoc.title: The Credit Vault Contract Vault is a contract that handles the credit proposal, liquidation, and settlement. Among the 3 contracts, this contract must be deployed second, because it depends on the token contract but the staking contract depended on it.
